metadata.title: English Speaking Practice | Speaking
metadata.description: Practice English speaking with AI chat bot for intelligent conversations. Practice daily English communication with instant feedback and personalized exercises.

page.description: Practice communication in real-life situations with intelligent AI Coach

coffeeShop.scenario: You walk into a busy coffee shop during peak hours and order your favorite drink.

jobInterview.scenario: You participate in a professional interview for your desired position, being asked about your experience and goals.

firstDate.scenario: First date at a cozy restaurant, both sides learn about interests and personal stories.

presentation.scenario: You present your research in front of the class and answer questions from the professor.

airport.scenario: You check-in at an international airport and ask about luggage and seat changes.

teamMeeting.scenario: Weekly team meeting to report progress and discuss solutions for new issues.

shopping.scenario: You look for a specific product and ask about alternative options or warranties.

doctorVisit.scenario: You describe symptoms during a follow-up visit and ask about treatment options.
